extendedInfo.description: A complete world cup cricket app with Latest News, Fixtures, Live Scores, Team Info, Group Standings and much much more.For any questions or comments contact administrator@faltooApps.com

reviews.comment: Love this App!! This is a great app for use during the Cricket world cup. Once you get hooked to this application all others will fail in front of it. Cant beat this application, its a MUST DOWNLOAD!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Try to update recent standings up to date

reviews.comment: Great app....... Of all the Cricket apps released till today this app rates above all of them. Great UI and nice features with precise live scores, team detail and day to day news. Easy to Use !!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app!!! World cup fever is on and there are many cricket apps lauched in market. But this one is easy to use with great features!! DO DOWNLOAD!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app!!! With easy to use and lots of features. This app is gonna rock during world cup. Guys do download this app and have fun!!!
